refnamediv.refpurpose: Displays the BRL-CAD regions that are part of the indicated MUVES components.

refsection.para: Displays the BRL-CAD regions that are part of the indicated MUVES components. The internal list of MUVES components must have been created earlier by the read_muves command. The MUVES components listed on the command line must not use any wildcards (the expansion will result in BRL-CAD objects, not MUVES components).
The example shows the use of the e_muves command to display the BRL-CAD regions that make up the specified MUVES components.

info.title: Display the BRL-CAD regions that make up the specified MUVES components.

listitem.para: Displays the BRL-CAD regions that make up the MUVES components named fuel and transmission.

refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
